Name: Time Of Special Team(T.O.S.T)
About the game: 'Become a sniper of the special team and Succeed in the operation!' In 2035, Cauldron-City with only disorder and chaos remain. Where the shadows of darkness are cast, Are you ready to regain the hope of this city? Assigned as a sniper of the confidential special team, you must remove the enemies covertly and accurately. Thereâ€™s no further delay. Just tonight, a great operation is taken to save the city. - Tutorial Stage: Before getting into the operation, you need to be fully prepared to become a sniper. With Jenna, you are not afraid of any enemies. - Changing Viewpoint: Snipers from G.H.O.S.T. are aiming at enemies from each of their positions. You can freely choose a sniping viewpoint as you want. - Stage: To be a perfect sniper, you'll be participating in every time & space of G.H.O.S.T. Join the operational briefing inside tactical vehicles. - Special bullets, Detection skill: High-tech weapons are available. It is important to exercise your skill in any difficult situations.
